text: Eric Samuel André (born April 4, 1983) is an American actor, comedian and television host. He is the creator, host, and co-writer of The Eric Andre Show on Adult Swim. André played Mike on the FXX series Man Seeking Woman. ==References== ==Other websites== * * The Eric Andre Show at Adult Swim * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Florida Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:American television writers Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Florida Category:People from Boca Raton, Florida Category:Writers from Florida
title: Eric André
